output.major_name: Nursing, Concurrent Enrollment Program (CEP) ADN to BSN

upper_division.course_name: Community Health Theory for RN to BSN Program

notes: String: Students must satisfy the specific degree requirements for their undergraduate major and fulfill the following University degree requirements:
String: Academic (program total units with an average 2.0 GPA - “C” or better)
String: General Education (GE) (34 Lower Division + 9 Upper Division)
String: American Institutions (AI) (0-6 units) (may be satisfied in GE Areas 3B, 4, UD 3, UD 4)
String: Graduation Writing Assessment Requirement (GWAR) (3 units)
String: Units in Residence (30 units, including 24 upper division and 12 in major)
String: Upper Division Units (40 units, including 12 upper div in major for BA, 18 upper div in major for BS)
String: Exceptions for University Graduation Requirements including exemptions and waivers, are approved for specific majors and on a case-by-case evaluation only.
String: Transfer Units: 60 (Note: Applicants must have completed the 34 Core Lower Division GE Requirements. Physical Education Requirement is waived)
String: Upper Division GE: 3 (6 units may be satisfied by major coursework: UD Areas: 2/5, 4)
String: EVC Lower Division Transfer Units: 70
